p: To ensure that the crystal used for the structure determination is representative for the whole sample, a powder diffraction pattern of a bulk sample was recorded. A Rietveld refinement of the PXRD data revealed that 93 wt% of the bulk material was indeed the afore described phase Sr[Li 2Al 2O 2N 2], with impurities of SrO (7 wt%) and AlN (not quantifiable). For further details see Supplementary Note 1, Supplementary Table 8, and Supplementary Fig. 2.
